title: How to Be Good at Red Faction Guerrilla Online

steps.headline: The hammer: the hammer is One of the most powerful weapons in the game, it has the ability to smash any EDF they throw at you.
steps.description: Use this to get through a wall without wasting ammo, and sending the vital salvage from flying off, and never being seen again. It is also a bit more silent, especially if you need to make your own door...

steps.headline: Sprint often, although it doesn't seem physically possible, sprint everywhere you go, it will make you harder to hit, and you can clear the area fast after destroying a bridge or base.
find the ore deposits, they'll give you salvage bonuses, they are rarely found alone so bust em all up.
Do the side missions.
steps.description: When you do them, you'll be granted armor, and weapons out the wazoo

steps.headline: When you see the singularity bombs, grab em.
steps.description: Keep em, collect em. When the arsenal is full, use them to blow the crap out of a base.

steps.headline: When the EDF is chasing you, although it may not seem smart, run on the sides of the road.
steps.description: The people will see you, and attack your pursuers.

steps.headline: The nano rifle comes in handy, always keep it with you.
steal EDF weapons.
steps.description: If you see a new one, kill the one using it, and take the gun.

steps.headline: Guerilla crates are explosive, if you're being chased, you have some charges, and there's a crate in the vicinity blow it up when the enemy comes, use the crates in demolition, withdrawal the ammo, then blast em when the enemy is near
Don't be stupid, blow up a building by going through the outside, not the inside.
On the ice caps there are some large wanted signs for Alec, use caution when destroying them, the EDF pops right in when one of their precious signs are destroyed.
Watch out for cars.
steps.description: They will squish you without mercy

steps.headline: when the opportunity times, use the walkers.
steps.description: Easiest way to destroy a building right there my friend...

steps.headline: Listen to some heavy metal music while playing the game.

When an EDF vehicle comes in to bang you up, use the hammer, jump in the air, and smash the gunner's skull, and keep on banging the driver's door until he comes out, then smash him too, and if the turret has a good weapon, that shoots explosives take the vehicle and drive.
When using the nano rifle, aim for the wings on the fighter planes, take out one wing, and the whole plane goes down.
The marauder's vehicles may look too flashy, and be uncoordinated, but they're good for a quick getaway, and can take lots of damage.
